packages.title: Luxury Shopping Experience
packages.description: Package description: Enjoy a personal shopping experience at Miami's top designer boutiques, including a personal stylist and exclusive discounts.

packages.title: Miami Market Tour
packages.description: Package description: Discover local flavors at Miami's best markets with tastings and insights from local vendors on this guided market tour.

packages.title: Vintage Shopping Day
packages.description: Package description: Explore Miami's best vintage and thrift stores with a guided shopping experience, including tips on finding hidden treasures.

packages.title: Artisan Craft Workshop
packages.description: Package description: Participate in a hands-on workshop to create your own artisanal crafts, followed by shopping for unique handmade goods.

packages.title: Eco-Friendly Shopping Tour
packages.description: Package description: Immerse yourself in Miami's eco-conscious shopping scene with a guided tour of sustainable shops and boutiques. Discover ethically sourced products, eco-friendly fashion, and zero-waste stores while learning about the importance of sustainable living.

packages.title: Fashion District Shopping Spree
packages.description: Package description: Experience a day of shopping in Miami’s fashion district, with exclusive access to designer samples and private sales.
